title: Cellex-C Speed Peel Facial Gel, 90 ml
description: Instantly removes superficial skin build-up. Speed Peel Facial Gel is a pale leaf green, minty-fragranced formulation, containing natural exfoliating agents and enzymes in an oil-free, hydrating gel tropical and desert plant extracts renowned for their superb moisture binding and exfoliating qualities enhance this truly unique product. Instantly and gently peels dull, dry, superficial skin cells and polishes the skin on your face to produce a smooth, radiant texture and glow.

Hairdo trade nbsp Wrap Around Pony is available in multi tonal shades that have been created to complement just about anyone rsquo s hair color.
